docs.snippet: Seemingly respectable members of the mainstream — a police officer, a paramedic, a rabbi, an airline pilot, an architect, a Boy Scout leader — were caught using the Internet to collect and trade child pornography, federal officials sai...
docs.lead_paragraph: Seemingly respectable members of the mainstream — a police officer, a paramedic, a rabbi, an airline pilot, an architect, a Boy Scout leader — were caught using the Internet to collect and trade child pornography, federal officials said Wednesday.

headline.main: Dozens Charged in Child Porn Case in NYC Area
headline.print_headline: Dozens Charged in Child Porn Case in NYC Area

docs.snippet: Tom Wolf’s victory set up what Democrats hope will be one of the party’s best chances this fall to flip a governor’s mansion now held by a Republican....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tom Wolf’s victory set up what Democrats hope will be one of the party’s best chances this fall to flip a governor’s mansion now held by a Republican.
docs.abstract: Tom Wolf, a wealthy businessman and a former Peace Corps volunteer, wins Democratic nomination for governor of Pennsylvania, setting up what his party hopes will be one of its best chances in fall elections to flip a governor’s mansion now held by a Republican; will face Gov Tom Corbett, who has had difficulty persuading voters to credit him for an improving economy.

headline.main: Democrats, Seeing Opportunity, Nominate Businessman for Pennsylvania Governor
headline.print_headline: Democrats, Seeing Opportunity, Nominate Businessman for Pennsylvania Governor
